00053 void setBoneRollFromNormal(EditBone *bone, float *no, float UNUSED(invmat[][4]), float tmat[][3])
00054 {
00055     if (no != NULL && !is_zero_v3(no))
00056     {
00057         float normal[3];
00058 
00059         copy_v3_v3(normal, no); 
00060         mul_m3_v3(tmat, normal);
00061         
00062         bone->roll = ED_rollBoneToVector(bone, normal, FALSE);
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 float calcArcCorrelation(BArcIterator *iter, int start, int end, float v0[3], float n[3])
00067 {
00068     int len = 2 + abs(end - start);
00069     
00070     if (len > 2)
00071     {
00072         float avg_t = 0.0f;
00073         float s_t = 0.0f;
00074         float s_xyz = 0.0f;
00075         int i;
00076         
00077         /* First pass, calculate average */
00078         for (i = start; i <= end; i++)
00079         {
00080             float v[3];
00081             
00082             IT_peek(iter, i);
00083             sub_v3_v3v3(v, iter->p, v0);
00084             avg_t += dot_v3v3(v, n);
00085         }
00086         
00087         avg_t /= dot_v3v3(n, n);
00088         avg_t += 1.0f; /* adding start (0) and end (1) values */
00089         avg_t /= len;
00090         
00091         /* Second pass, calculate s_xyz and s_t */
00092         for (i = start; i <= end; i++)
00093         {
00094             float v[3], d[3];
00095             float dt;
00096             
00097             IT_peek(iter, i);
00098             sub_v3_v3v3(v, iter->p, v0);
00099             project_v3_v3v3(d, v, n);
00100             sub_v3_v3(v, d);
00101             
00102             dt = len_v3(d) - avg_t;
00103             
00104             s_t += dt * dt;
00105             s_xyz += dot_v3v3(v, v);
00106         }
00107         
00108         /* adding start(0) and end(1) values to s_t */
00109         s_t += (avg_t * avg_t) + (1 - avg_t) * (1 - avg_t);
00110         
00111         return 1.0f - s_xyz / s_t; 
00112     }
00113     else
00114     {
00115         return 1.0f;
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 int nextFixedSubdivision(ToolSettings *toolsettings, BArcIterator *iter, int start, int end, float UNUSED(head[3]), float p[3])
00120 {
00121     static float stroke_length = 0;
00122     static float current_length;
00123     static char n;
00124     float *v1, *v2;
00125     float length_threshold;
00126     int i;
00127     
00128     if (stroke_length == 0)
00129     {
00130         current_length = 0;
00131 
00132         IT_peek(iter, start);
00133         v1 = iter->p;
00134         
00135         for (i = start + 1; i <= end; i++)
00136         {
00137             IT_peek(iter, i);
00138             v2 = iter->p;
00139 
00140             stroke_length += len_v3v3(v1, v2);
00141             
00142             v1 = v2;
00143         }
00144         
00145         n = 0;
00146         current_length = 0;
00147     }
00148     
00149     n++;
00150     
00151     length_threshold = n * stroke_length / toolsettings->skgen_subdivision_number;
00152     
00153     IT_peek(iter, start);
00154     v1 = iter->p;
00155 
00156     /* < and not <= because we don't care about end, it is P_EXACT anyway */
00157     for (i = start + 1; i < end; i++)
00158     {
00159         IT_peek(iter, i);
00160         v2 = iter->p;
00161 
00162         current_length += len_v3v3(v1, v2);
00163 
00164         if (current_length >= length_threshold) {
00165             copy_v3_v3(p, v2);
00166             return i;
00167         }
00168         
00169         v1 = v2;
00170     }
00171     
00172     stroke_length = 0;
00173     
00174     return -1;
00175 }
00176 int nextAdaptativeSubdivision(ToolSettings *toolsettings, BArcIterator *iter, int start, int end, float head[3], float p[3])
00177 {
00178     float correlation_threshold = toolsettings->skgen_correlation_limit;
00179     float *start_p;
00180     float n[3];
00181     int i;
00182     
00183     IT_peek(iter, start);
00184     start_p = iter->p;
00185 
00186     for (i = start + 2; i <= end; i++)
00187     {
00188         /* Calculate normal */
00189         IT_peek(iter, i);
00190         sub_v3_v3v3(n, iter->p, head);
00191 
00192         if (calcArcCorrelation(iter, start, i, start_p, n) < correlation_threshold) {
00193             IT_peek(iter, i - 1);
00194             copy_v3_v3(p, iter->p);
00195             return i - 1;
00196         }
00197     }
00198     
00199     return -1;
00200 }
00201 
00202 int nextLengthSubdivision(ToolSettings *toolsettings, BArcIterator *iter, int start, int end, float head[3], float p[3])
00203 {
00204     float lengthLimit = toolsettings->skgen_length_limit;
00205     int same = 1;
00206     int i;
00207     
00208     i = start + 1;
00209     while (i <= end)
00210     {
00211         float *vec0;
00212         float *vec1;
00213         
00214         IT_peek(iter, i - 1);
00215         vec0 = iter->p;
00216 
00217         IT_peek(iter, i);
00218         vec1 = iter->p;
00219         
00220         /* If lengthLimit hits the current segment */
00221         if (len_v3v3(vec1, head) > lengthLimit)
00222         {
00223             if (same == 0)
00224             {
00225                 float dv[3], off[3];
00226                 float a, b, c, f;
00227                 
00228                 /* Solve quadratic distance equation */
00229                 sub_v3_v3v3(dv, vec1, vec0);
00230                 a = dot_v3v3(dv, dv);
00231                 
00232                 sub_v3_v3v3(off, vec0, head);
00233                 b = 2 * dot_v3v3(dv, off);
00234                 
00235                 c = dot_v3v3(off, off) - (lengthLimit * lengthLimit);
00236                 
00237                 f = (-b + (float)sqrt(b * b - 4 * a * c)) / (2 * a);
00238                 
00239                 //printf("a %f, b %f, c %f, f %f\n", a, b, c, f);
00240                 
00241                 if (isnan(f) == 0 && f < 1.0f) {
00242                     copy_v3_v3(p, dv);
00243                     mul_v3_fl(p, f);
00244                     add_v3_v3(p, vec0);
00245                 }
00246                 else {
00247                     copy_v3_v3(p, vec1);
00248                 }
00249             }
00250             else {
00251                 float dv[3];
00252                 
00253                 sub_v3_v3v3(dv, vec1, vec0);
00254                 normalize_v3(dv);
00255                  
00256                 copy_v3_v3(p, dv);
00257                 mul_v3_fl(p, lengthLimit);
00258                 add_v3_v3(p, head);
00259             }
00260             
00261             return i - 1; /* restart at lower bound */
00262         }
00263         else
00264         {
00265             i++;
00266             same = 0; // Reset same
00267         }
00268     }
00269     
00270     return -1;
00271 }
00272 
00273 EditBone * subdivideArcBy(ToolSettings *toolsettings, bArmature *arm, ListBase *UNUSED(editbones), BArcIterator *iter, float invmat[][4], float tmat[][3], NextSubdivisionFunc next_subdividion)
00274 {
00275     EditBone *lastBone = NULL;
00276     EditBone *child = NULL;
00277     EditBone *parent = NULL;
00278     float *normal = NULL;
00279     float size_buffer = 1.2;
00280     int bone_start = 0;
00281     int end = iter->length;
00282     int index;
00283     
00284     IT_head(iter);
00285     
00286     parent = ED_armature_edit_bone_add(arm, "Bone");
00287     copy_v3_v3(parent->head, iter->p);
00288     
00289     if (iter->size > 0)
00290     {
00291         parent->rad_head = iter->size * size_buffer;
00292     }
00293     
00294     normal = iter->no;
00295     
00296     index = next_subdividion(toolsettings, iter, bone_start, end, parent->head, parent->tail);
00297     while (index != -1)
00298     {
00299         IT_peek(iter, index);
00300 
00301         child = ED_armature_edit_bone_add(arm, "Bone");
00302         copy_v3_v3(child->head, parent->tail);
00303         child->parent = parent;
00304         child->flag |= BONE_CONNECTED;
00305         
00306         if (iter->size > 0)
00307         {
00308             child->rad_head = iter->size * size_buffer;
00309             parent->rad_tail = iter->size * size_buffer;
00310         }
00311 
00312         /* going to next bone, fix parent */
00313         mul_m4_v3(invmat, parent->tail);
00314         mul_m4_v3(invmat, parent->head);
00315         setBoneRollFromNormal(parent, normal, invmat, tmat);
00316 
00317         parent = child; // new child is next parent
00318         bone_start = index; // start next bone from current index
00319 
00320         normal = iter->no; /* use normal at head, not tail */
00321 
00322         index = next_subdividion(toolsettings, iter, bone_start, end, parent->head, parent->tail);
00323     }
00324     
00325     iter->tail(iter);
00326 
00327     copy_v3_v3(parent->tail, iter->p);
00328     if (iter->size > 0) {
00329         parent->rad_tail = iter->size * size_buffer;
00330     }
00331         
00332     /* fix last bone */
00333     mul_m4_v3(invmat, parent->tail);
00334     mul_m4_v3(invmat, parent->head);
00335     setBoneRollFromNormal(parent, iter->no, invmat, tmat);
00336     lastBone = parent;
00337     
00338     return lastBone;
00339 }
